translations: n.假释，有条件的释放；（语言学）言语；<史>（战俘所作不逃跑或获释后按规定回来受监管的）宣誓，诺言

sentences.sentence: His parole application is up for review next week.
sentences.translation: 他的假释申请下周审查。

sentences.sentence: Of course, when they go to college, they might start objecting to being monitored as they're on parole.
sentences.translation: 当然，当他们上了大学，他们可能会开始反对在假释期间被监视。
